channel.title: MicroFire | 562 Rs2hd | We are the future of online gaming | Spawn server |
channel.description:
Forums - [url=http://www.microfire.smffy.com]here[/url] Msn - Microfire@hotmail.co.uk Youtube - [url=http://www.youtube.com/user/microfireLTD]here[/url] << Subscribe! [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/2lswnzt.png[/img] ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ - New 'members' rank & has special 'members' area with shop. - ::item for all (with restrictions) - 91 Downloads in 3 days! - Skills that are working: firmaking, Thieving, Mining, Agility, Cooking, Fishing, Woodcutting. (all with proof) - Boss's that have been added: Tormented demon, King black dragon, Jad & Corpral beast. (all with proof) - Working White portal, safe ! 100%. - Working overloads! - Working HD client with fullscreen working. (with proof) - Skillcapes are all working (only took one picture for proof) - Home at falador with shops all arround; That way there not all in the same place. - New Forums witch will be updated everyday 7 days per week. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ So now i bet you guys are thinking 'so why does he want a development team? every thinks done'. Heres a small list of things that need doing; - Barrows! - Bork - Thieving base needs cleaning up. - Createing a new 'fletching base' - Adding barrows with correct tunnels, digg down & random Barrows Brother. - Add on to the current fishing base. - Fix white knight Animations. - Add More onto the summoning base (getting pictures of summoning now) - Optional- Soul wars. ( This is not a major worry). [i]So you think your up for the challenge?[/i]
Name: Age: Coding experiance: Msn (way of contact): Email Adress: What you have to offer:
Media: [img]http://i55.tinypic.com/i6jwac.png[/img] [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/2icays8.png[/img] [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/mb0c50.png[/img] [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/15koyt.png[/img] [img]http://i52.tinypic.com/33c1ba9.png[/img] [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/t7xyqo.png[/img] [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/2q01zz8.png[/img] [img]http://i52.tinypic.com/2ldaj2v.png[/img] [img]http://i55.tinypic.com/34rj2ub.png[/img] [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/jhrhu9.png[/img] [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/2uh8ow1.png[/img] [img]http://i52.tinypic.com/30iyj9d.png[/img] [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/2s13cz6.png[/img] [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/21l8wu9.png[/img] [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/28qs046.png[/img] [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/dwffwl.png[/img] [img]http://i52.tinypic.com/2v8pwmp.png[/img] [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/34seyw4.png[/img] [img]http://i55.tinypic.com/3asyf.png[/img] [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/25ti345.png[/img] [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/vr55oo.png[/img] [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/nevx5e.png[/img] [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/2ikrssw.png[/img] [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/awrngz.png[/img] [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/v5e1yw.png[/img [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/72stgp.png[/img] [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/2qailoo.png[/img] Good luck. By the way.. We will be useing a program called 'drop box' to share and update our files. Thanks, MicroFire Team.

item.title: MicroFire | 562 Rs2hd | We are the future of online gaming | Spawn server |
item.dc:creator: @Z-Codez Z-Codez
item.description:
@Z-Codez wrote:

Forums - here
Msn - Microfire@hotmail.co.uk
Youtube - here << Subscribe!

- New 'members' rank & has special 'members' area with shop.
- ::item for all (with restrictions)
- 91 Downloads in 3 days!
- Skills that are working: firmaking, Thieving, Mining, Agility, Cooking, Fishing, Woodcutting. (all with proof)
- Boss's that have been added: Tormented demon, King black dragon, Jad & Corpral beast. (all with proof)
- Working White portal, safe ! 100%.
- Working overloads!
- Working HD client with fullscreen working. (with proof)
- Skillcapes are all working (only took one picture for proof)
- Home at falador with shops all arround; That way there not all in the same place.
- New Forums witch will be updated everyday 7 days per week. 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
So now i bet you guys are thinking 'so why does he want a development team? every thinks done'.
Heres a small list of things that need doing;
- Barrows!
- Bork
- Thieving base needs cleaning up.
- Createing a new 'fletching base'
- Adding barrows with correct tunnels, digg down & random Barrows Brother.
- Add on to the current fishing base.
- Fix white knight Animations.
- Add More onto the summoning base (getting pictures of summoning now)
- Optional- Soul wars. ( This is not a major worry).

[i]So you think your up for the challenge?[/i]
